content.text: What do you do for a living?
Oh wow, that's cool! I love cooking.
Me too! It's so much fun and you can make so many different dishes.
What's your favorite dish to cook?
I love making lasagna. It's so hearty and delicious.
That's a great choice! I love lasagna too.
I love to go to the skatepark and play video games.
Skateboarding is fun! I used to do it a lot when I was younger.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I'm not very good at it, but it's still a lot of fun.
Do you play any video games?
Yeah, I play a lot of video games. I'm a big fan of the Zelda series.
Nice! I love Zelda too. What's your favorite game in the series?
I think my favorite is Ocarina of Time. What's your favorite?
I think mine is Majora's Mask. It's so dark and mysterious.
That's a great choice. It's definitely one of the best games in the series
